verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he that considereth <S%H7919><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will deliver <S%H4422><s%> him in the day <S%H3117><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will preserve <S%H8104><s%> him <S%H2421><s%>, and keep him alive, And he shall be blessed <S%H833><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>; And deliver <S%H5414><s%> not thou him unto the will <S%H5315><s%> of his enemies <S%H341><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will support <S%H5582><s%> him upon the couch <S%H6210><s%> of languishing <S%H1741><s%>: Thou makest <S%H2015><s%> all his bed <S%H6210><s%> in his sickness <S%H2483><s%>.
I said <S%H559><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me <S%H7495><s%>: Heal my soul <S%H5315><s%>; For I have sinned against thee <S%H2398><s%>.
Mine enemies <S%H341><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against me <S%H4191><s%>, saying, When will he die, and his name <S%H8034><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>?

And if he come <S%H935><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> me <S%H1696><s%>, he speaketh falsehood <S%H7723><s%>; His heart <S%H3820><s%> gathereth <S%H6908><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> to itself <S%H3318><s%>: When he goeth abroad <S%H2351><s%>, he telleth it <S%H1696><s%>.
All that hate <S%H8130><s%> me whisper <S%H3907><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against me <S%H2803><s%>; Against me do they devise my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
An evil <S%H1100><s%> disease <S%H1697><s%>, say they <S%H3332><s%>, cleaveth fast unto him <S%H7901><s%>; And now that he lieth he shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%>.

Yea <S%H7965><s%>, mine own familiar friend <S%H376><s%>, in whom I trusted <S%H982><s%>, Who did eat <S%H398><s%> of my bread <S%H3899><s%>, Hath lifted up <S%H1431><s%> his heel against me <S%H6119><s%>.
But thou <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me <S%H6965><s%>, and raise me up, That I may requite them <S%H7999><s%>.
By this I know <S%H3045><s%> that thou delightest <S%H2654><s%> in me <S%H341><s%>, Because mine enemy doth not triumph over me <S%H7321><s%>.
And as for me <S%H8551><s%>, thou upholdest me in mine integrity <S%H8537><s%>, And settest <S%H5324><s%> me before thy face <S%H6440><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, From everlasting <S%H5769><s%> and to everlasting <S%H5769><s%>. Amen <S%H543><s%>, and Amen <S%H543><s%>.
